dialogflow_bot_id_description: Select the bot to use from the list of bots. Use comma to seperate values in respective fields
dialogflow_environment_description: Name of the Dialogflow environment. Default environment is draft
dialogflow_fallback_responses_limit_desc: The app will automatically trigger handover if consecutive fallback intents are triggered N no of times. This setting defines this value N
target_department_for_handover_descripti: Upon bot-to-liveagent handover, the visitor will be transferred to this Department
dialogflow_handover_message_description: The Bot will send this message to Visitor upon handover
dialogflow_service_unavailable_message_d: The Bot will send this message to Visitor if service is unavailable
dialogflow_close_chat_message_descriptio: This message will be sent automatically when a chat is closed
dialogflow_hide_quick_replies_descriptio: If enabled, then all quick-replies will hide when a visitor clicks on any one of them
dialogflow_enable_chat_closed_by_visitor: Enable Dialogflow Event When Visitor Ends Chat
If enabled, then a dialogflow event will be triggered when visitor ends chat
dialogflow_chat_closed_by_visitor_event_: Dialogflow Event Name When Visitor Ends Chat
The bot will trigger this dialogflow event when visitor ends chat
dialogflow_enable_welcome_message_descri: If enabled, then a custom welcome message will be sent when bot is assigned to any visitor
dialogflow_welcome_message: Dialogflow Message to send on start
dialogflow_welcome_message_description: Custom welcome message to send to visitor
dialogflow_welcome_intent_on_start_descr: If enabled, then a welcome event will be sent when bot is assigned to any visitor
dialogflow_enable_customer_timeout_descr: Indicates whether chats are ended if the customer doesnâ€™t respond within a specified period.
dialogflow_customer_timeout_time_descrip: Sets the amount of time that a customer has to respond to an agent message before the session ends. The timer stops when the customer sends a message and starts again from 0 on the next agent's message.
dialogflow_customer_timeout_warning_time:
Sets the amount of time that a customer has to respond to an agent message before a warning appears and a timer begins a countdown. 
The warning disappears (and the timer stops) each time the customer sends a message. 
The warning disappears (and the timer resets to 0) each time the agent sends message. 
The warning value must be shorter than the time-out value (we recommend at least 30 seconds).
dialogflow_customer_timeout_warning_mess: Enter message to show to user as idle timeout warning. Use %t as placeholder for count down.
dialogflow_session_maintenance_interval_: The bot will send session maintenance event to dialogflow at every interval. The interval is a human-readable format String (i.e. 8 minutes). Session Maintenance is for keeping long running dialogflow sessions active.
dialogflow_session_maintenance_event_nam: The bot will trigger this dialogflow event for session maintenance
